price: Wͻbεtena mu, na wͻnhwehwε sε wͻbɛfri hͻ da.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
